articles.title: Warren Buffett's AI Bets: 23.8% of Berkshire Hathaway's $298 Billion Stock Portfolio Is Held in These 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Growth Stocks
articles.content: Berkshire Hathaway has significant investments in Apple and Amazon, which are leveraging AI technology to drive growth. However, Berkshire has been reducing its position in Apple, signaling a cautious approach to the market.

articles.title: Prediction: 2 Stocks That Will Be Worth More Than Apple 10 Years From Now
articles.content: The article discusses the possibility of Alphabet (Google) and Amazon outperforming Apple in the next decade, as Apple's innovation seems to be slowing down while its competitors continue to innovate and disrupt various industries.

articles.title: Flexible Electronics Market to Reach USD 75.04 Billion by 2032, Fueled by Demand in Consumer Electronics and Automotive Applications | Research by SNS Insider
articles.content: The flexible electronics market is expected to grow significantly, driven by increasing demand in the automotive, healthcare, and consumer electronics sectors. Advancements in technology and a focus on sustainability are driving the adoption of flexible displays, sensors, and batteries in various applications.

articles.title: Should Investors Chase Tech Gains Into Year-End?
articles.content: The tech sector has been a strong performer in 2024, with the Technology Select Sector SPDR® Fund (XLK) gaining 21.3% year-to-date. However, the performance of its top holdings, NVIDIA, Apple, and Microsoft, will be crucial in determining whether the sector can continue its rally into the end of the year.

articles.title: 3 Warren Buffett Stocks to Hold Forever
articles.content: The article discusses three stocks that are part of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway portfolio: Coca-Cola, Apple, and Berkshire Hathaway itself. It highlights the reasons why these stocks are good long-term investments, including Coca-Cola's reliable dividend, Apple's strong brand and services business, and Berkshire Hathaway's diverse holdings and Buffett's investment strategy.

articles.title: Huawei sees excitement for Mate 70 phone wane, analysts say
articles.content: Huawei is seeing less consumer excitement in China for its newly launched Mate 70 smartphone, which could impact the Chinese tech giant's overall shipments for the year to benefit Apple and other...

articles.title: Apple: Potential Breakout Ahead (Technical Analysis)(Rating Upgrade)
articles.content: We are bullish on Apple's strong recovery, positive earnings, and potential for further upside, maintaining long position unless critical support is broken. See more here.

articles.title: How To Build A $25,000 Dividend Portfolio, Johnson & Johnson As Your Core Holding
articles.content: Johnson & Johnson offers an effective combination of dividend income and dividend growth. Check out my portfolio with JNJ stock as the largest proportion.

articles.title: EU Ends Probes on Amazon, Starbucks, Fiat Tax Deals After Court Defeats
articles.content: The decision ends three of the EU competition regulator’s attempts to crack down on international companies’ tax deals.
